text: Nothing gave my Gampy more joy than service to others, especially supporting and caring for those who risk making the ultimate sacrifice everyday. His leadership taught us to be kinder and gentler, to love each other. We will miss him dearly. pic. twitter. com / i2iR5U3ikc — Jeb Bush, Jr. ( @ JebBushJr ) December 1, 2018 Statement from President Donald J. Trump and First Lady Melania Trump on the Passing of Former President George H. W. Bush pic. twitter. com / qxPsp4Ggs7 — Donald J. Trump ( @ realDonaldTrump ) December 1, 2018 Rest In Peace, President George H. W. Bush. President Bush committed his life
